QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_ConstructionEquipmentResourceBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of construction equipment resources.

QtoDef.Name: UsageTime
QtoDef.Definition: Total time using the equipment including operating time and idle time.

QtoDef.Name: OperatingTime
QtoDef.Definition: Productive time using the equipment including operating time and excluding idle time.
